flawed_nl_solution:
2000 x 0.25 = <<2000*0.25=500>>500
The loser got 54% of the votes because 100 - 55 = <<100-55=54>>54
The winner got 275 votes because 500 x 0.55 = <<500*0.55=275>>275
The loser got 225 votes because 500 x 0.45 = <<500*0.45=225>>225
The winner got 50 more votes because 275 - 225 = <<275-225=50>>50
#### 50

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 54. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
